item.title: Kjellander Sjöberg
item.description: Project Name: Gustav III Square Location: Östersund, Sweden Date Designed: 2017 Date Completed: In Progress Size: 26,500 sqm Client: Östersund Municipality, Diös Programme: Culture ABOUT Kjellander Sjöberg Kjellander Sjöberg is based in Stockholm, Sweden and provides architectural and urban design services in the Nordic countries. Established in 1998, it is currently a multi-nationality medium-sized office led by partners Ola Kjellander, Stefan Sjöberg, Mi Inkinen and Lena Viterstedt. Kjellander Sjöberg believes that the built environment influences social progress, quality of life and cultural richness.
